numlitem.para: Right and Left or Right and Center IRS stabilized compass systems are operative, and
Aircraft is operated with dual independent navigation capability and under positive radar control by ATC on en route portion of flight.
Under positive radar control by ATC on the en route portion of the flight and with any combination of two normally operating IRS stabilized compass systems and dual independent navigation capability.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 3a.
Dispatch only under positive radar control for entire portion of flight (See MEL 34-21-1-1-1-1-1 (L), 34-21-1-1-1-2 (R) or 34-21-1-1-1-1-2 (C) as applicable).

placard.para: Placard face of compass located near P5 panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log (See MEL 34-21-1-1-1-1-1 (L), 34-21-1-1-1-2 (R) or 34-21-1-1-1-1-2 (C) as applicable).

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
